THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
04.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:

2019/KER/347
Crl.MC.No. 8315 of 2018
14..
ORDER
Petition filed under Section 482 Cr.P.C.

2. Petitioners are the accused in Crime No. 1284
of 2018 of Munambam Police Station registered
for the offences under Sections 143, 144, 147,
148, 308, 324, 326 & 452 r/w Section 149 of
the Indian Penal Code. Respondents 2 to 4 are
the victims. It is submitted that the matter
has been settled and the proceedings in the
criminal case may be quashed.

3. Heard the learned counsel for the petitioners
and respondents 2 to 4 and the learned Public
Prosecutor.

4. I have perused the affidavits filed by
respondents 2 to 4, who have entered
appearance through counsel. I am satisfied
that the allegation of settlement is true and
no public interest is involved. There is no

2019/KER/347
Crl.MC.No. 8315 of 2018
1.5e.
impediment for granting the prayer of the
petitioners.
In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed. The
proceedings in Crime No. 1284 of 2018 of
Munambam Police Station are quashed. The
learned magistrate may pass appropriate orders
for the disposal of the material objects, if
any, produced in the case.
Sd/-
K.ABRAHAM MATHEW
JUDGE
Bka/05.01.2019
